participant_2.background:
My weight is not relevant to this question.
i am failing some of my classes.
my name is nancy.
I like a soft bed for my baby.
I grew up in the Midwest where the summers are hot and the watermelon is sweet.

content.text: Hey Nancy! How is your day going?
Hey! It's going alright, thank you for asking. How about you?
Mine is going pretty well, thanks! I'm just finishing up some work and then I'm going to go for a walk.
That sounds like a good way to spend the day. I'm going to be spending some time with my baby today.
Oh, how cute! I love babies. What are their names?
Her name is Chloe. She's just a few months old.
Chloe is a beautiful name. I bet she's adorable.
She is! She's got big blue eyes and a little button nose.
I love babies' noses. They're so cute!
Me too! I could just eat her up.
I know what you mean. Babies are the best.
I think so too. They're so innocent and pure.
Do you have any other children?
No, Chloe is my first. I'm not sure if I want any more.
I think it's a personal decision. There's no right or wrong answer.
That's true. I'm just not sure if I'm ready for another one.
Well, you have plenty of time to decide. Just enjoy Chloe for now.
I plan on it! She's the best thing that's ever happened to me
